required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Fetal Nasal Bone Length Nomogram at 11-13wk+6days in Upper Egyptian Pregnant Women
clinical_study.official_title: Fetal Nasal Bone Length Nomogram at 11-13wk+6 Days in Upper Egyptain Pregnant Women

brief_summary.textblock: establish a reference values for the fetal nasal bone length (NBL) in upper egyptian pregnant women at 11-13wk+6 days

detailed_description.textblock: By using ultrasound measure fetal nasal bone length at 11-13wk+6days in Upper Egyptian pregnant women in mid-sagittal view in single pregnancy

primary_outcome.description: Establish nomogram for nasal bone length in Upper Egyptian pregnant women

study_pop.textblock: Cross sectional study of pregnant women in Upper Egypt at 11-13wk of gestation

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
Normal antenatal women of gestational age between 11 to 13week +6days. Single pregnancy. Viable fetus. No fetal malformation. No previous history of fetal malformation
Exclusion Criteria:
Medical diseased women . Multiple gestations . Fetal malformations . Missed abortion .

eligibility.gender_description: Non diseased Pregnant women at 11-13wk+6 days of gestation in single pregnancy without previous history of congenital anomalies
